content: written crochet pdf pattern in english us terminology no charts crochet skill level is intermediate the pattern consists of 21 rounds for this project you need yarnart begonia cotton thread 50 g / 1 76 oz / 185 yards / 169 m per skein 35 g / 1 23 oz / 129 yards / 118 m 3 mm hook finished size 10 / 25 cm if you have any questions feel free to contact me
